title: 🚨EMERGENCY BEAR MARKET EPISODE: What to do if you're scared

description:
Livestreamed Tuesday June 14th @ 10am EST

Ryan and David cover some of the current news in the market, and discuss bear market emotions.

If you need a shoulder to lean on, we gotchu fam.
